website_summaries.verdict: Offers the quality and sound you'd expect from Fender, making it a great choice for novices and experienced musicians.
pros: Excellent sound by a top brand
Has a beautiful finish with a mahogany back
Comes with essential accessories including an instructional DVD for beginners
cons: A few quality control issues noted, including guitars that arrived with warped necks

customer_reviews.title: Ideal setup for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Guitar sounds nice and keeps tune well. Perfect for a beginner. The mahogany dampens some of the high frequency vibes that the spruce topped version has, so I think the overall sound is a little richer. The kit is nice, since it comes with a set of crappy strings on the guitar and a set of decent strings to re-string with after some learning has occurred. I wish it came with a hard case or a stand as the soft gig bag is not ideal for storage when not in use, but you can't have it all. And at this price point, it's easy enough to add a $20 stand or $50 case to the Amazon shopping cart.
customer_reviews.author: Alex G. Dulude

customer_reviews.title: Fender Guitar
customer_reviews.text: The guitar package was delivered promptly with all the accessories detailed in the ad. The guitar itself was beautifully finished and seemed like a very good one. I am buying this for a Christmas gift, so until we actually tune it and play on it a little I can't offer much of a review. This is why I didn't give it a 5 star. I am hopeful I can come back and re-star it. The buy experience was great/ A follow-up on customer satisfaction was sent which says to me they are customer oriented which means a great deal to me. I would recommend this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Methner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful guitar for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful guitar. Got in Mahogany for my daughter who is learning to play. The sound is beautiful and the guitar looks very high quality. The bundle is a great value. We didn’t receive the gig bag with the original order but after contacting the seller it was shipped promptly.
customer_reviews.author: G's  Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered my Fender guitar, I mistakenly hit the submit button twice (long story). I contacted Austin Bazaar immediately upon realizing what happened. Excellent customer service. They immediately sent me a return label and I was able to get the second guitar back to them. Back to the one guitar I wanted....I am very happy with the look and quality of the guitar-especially because I was looking for a good "starter" guitar and did not want to spend a lot of money. I ordered the "bundle" and the DVD that comes with has been great to get me started! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Foss

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Guitar is beautiful, but has horrible fret buzz and cannot get all strings in tune 5th sring broke after a half turn. And yes i know what im doing owned about 7 guitars in my time and tuned em all. This guitar is not set up correctly. Will see if i can return it, and its a shame too cause it truely is a nice looking guitar.The neck on mine was warpped and seems to be a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Just get it
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome purchase! I have never played guitar but have always wanted too. After days of research I finally picked this one and it did not disappoint. Was delivered in great condition. Looked exactly like the picture. The extra add ins were the best! I had everything to start playing right out of the box (when I found a battery for the tuner) . This gig bag is thin so if you want more protection maybe get a hard case or padded one. The sound is bright and clear. It’s easy to play. Can’t wait to start learning to make some music
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great package
customer_reviews.text: I’m a beginner and I thought I’d go for this package. This is a truly beautiful guitar and it came with pretty much everything I needed to get started. I noticed one fret buzzing pretty bad and I was afraid perhaps the frets weren’t even. I emailed and they suggested a simple truss rod adjustment and even sent me a YouTube video. It worked like a charm and I couldn’t be happier. Great package, great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Zeitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner bundle.
customer_reviews.text: With a bit of research I found out that many people recommend this guitar for beginners. I bought this bundle with just that in mind. So far its treated me well and the guitar itself is beautiful. The vendor packaged everything neatly and everything looked as expected. Even the shipping was fast. Ordered it Saturday and got it on Sunday, wow.
customer_reviews.author: Dilan Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and playing guitar
customer_reviews.text: This thing sounds amazing, with pick, or finger strumming, even better with slide. Looks and feels like a high quality guitar. For the price, it’s hard to pass on this. I can’t stop looking at it, you can even use it as room decor and it still be worth it
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Good price/quality!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great guitar. Just as pictured and came with everything: tuner, strap, case, etc. It came already strung which I wasn't expecting. No damage I could see from shipping. It came in an amazon box and then a fender box. Overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar choice
customer_reviews.text: This arrived complete and the guitar sounds, looks , and feels great. Perfect for a beginning player.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing customer

customer_reviews.title: Extras does not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The guitar is beautiful and sounds great. But all the extras are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Maximilian

customer_reviews.title: Tuner not that great, but guitar is beautiful for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, the guitar sounds wonderful! As a beginner i thought i would need the bundle, but honestly you could probably buy the guitar alone. The tuner isn’t that great and fender has a great app on your phone you can use to tune.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Quality, comes with accessories for the same price others sold only the guitar.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for husband. He wanted a new guitar to keep at house to practice. His other one is always at church. He loves this guitar. He is a professional musician and said for the money, this was a awesome guitar.
customer_reviews.author: BanjoKitty

customer_reviews.title: Fret buzzzzz
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful guitar. But the strings set too low and causes bad fret buzz. A little irradiated since I’m has a “inspected” tag attached. Ordering replacement. Hopeful it’s set right.
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sons loves it. Minor scratch on the facing but worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar
customer_reviews.text: After many years I decided to pick up the guitar again, this is a first rate product and I would recommend for all including beginners!!
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve M. Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Really digging this guitar
customer_reviews.text: I had had a BC inexpensive guitar, and decided to upgrade for my beginning guitar class. The sound.... so much better! The chords are so much easier to play compared to the inexpensive guitar. I had an issue with the tuner, and the seller was so kind and prompt with a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Mikolajczak

customer_reviews.title: Learn to play beautifully with a beautiful guitar!
customer_reviews.text: Great, beautiful guitar. But the gig bag stinks from glue or the material that it is made out of. I’m afraid that the guitar will stink as well if I put it in the bag. A beautiful guitar deserves a better bag!
customer_reviews.author: PieBecca

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: Perfect instrument, amazing sound, great look, best I ever owned in 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: YULIYA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful guitar!
customer_reviews.text: The guitar was received in pristine condition. My son is a beginner but he is very pleased with it. However the bag enclosed is pretty shabby for this guitar. I’m not even sure it fits properly since we keep it on a guitar stand so far.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl time

customer_reviews.title: Best priced and sounding guitar
customer_reviews.text: Beauitful, great sounding guitar. Reasonably priced and perfect for a beginners
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never played guitar before, but bought this to learn. Seller was excellent, my guitar arrived super quick, and it looks and sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and awesome bundle.
customer_reviews.text: My first guitar. Really good sound and the bundle comes with everything you need to get started playing. I was able to tune it and start playing within ten minutes of opening the package. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: For the price point — this is a good purchase. Slender neck & low string action —— ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price point — this is a good purchase. Slender neck & low string action —— tuner , strings & picks nice touch. Gig bag however is lame.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Mones

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband for his birthday. It sounds beautiful and he loves playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Allyssa Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Quality guitar came in secure wrapping and packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Got my wife a phenomenal starter guitar and she won’t stop learning to rip. This bundle is everything for its price. It came with essentials to get you started. All we need now is a guitar stand
customer_reviews.author: My

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great beginner guitar for our 16-year old
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great beginner guitar for our 16-year old. Excellent sound and quality. Great guitar for the price.
customer_reviews.author: St. Steven

customer_reviews.title: At this price range it's terrific
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first guitar. you need to realize you are purchasing an entry level instrument. it is exactly what I needed for my RV use. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Dywelska

customer_reviews.title: Amazing guitar!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made guitar. Relatively easy to break in and very good sounding. Shipping packaging was well done and came with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Trottier

customer_reviews.title: Great service, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Guitar arrived on time and contained everything as advertised. I will also note that all was received in excellent condition. Great buying experience! Thanks Austin Baraar!
customer_reviews.author: goody quam

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my daughter. Can't say much other than she is happy with it so I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: TwoCents

customer_reviews.title: Smart purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with my purchase! Everything came in neat packaging, and everything was such nice quality for such a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Tuner sucks but guitar has a great sound. I love playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Ter

customer_reviews.title: Anniversary gift. My husband loves it. He keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: Anniversary gift.My husband loves it. He keeps talking about how gorgeous it is and how smooth it is to play. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Everything is of good quality and works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Son's guitar
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my son and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Ron

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: All items can super quick. All in good shape and my music major daughter loves it. Great price for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: MARY C MEIER

product_meta.title: Fender CD-60S Solid Top Dreadnought Acoustic Guitar - Natural Bundle with Gig Bag, Tuner, Strap, Strings, Picks, Austin Bazaar Instructional DVD, and Polishing Cloth
product_meta.description:
Adding value to your purchase, Austin Bazaar bundles your instrument with necessary accessories. Everything you need to start playing immediately comes in one box. Save yourself the hassle and save some money while you're at it. A gig bag is included so you can keep your instrument safely packed away when you're on the go. An easy-to-use clip-on tuner is included so you can keep your instrument in tune. A strap is included so you can practice or better yet perform while standing up. Strings are included so you have extra for later. Picks are included so you can start playing right out of the box. An Austin Bazaar instructional DVD is included so you can pick up some tips while learning your new instrument. An Austin Bazaar polishing cloth is included so you can keep your new instrument in mint condition. 

The CD-60S is one of our most popular models and is ideal for players looking for a high-quality affordable dreadnought with great tone and excellent playability. With its quality solid spruce top, easy-to-play neck with rolled fingerboard and mahogany back and sides, the CD60-S is perfect for the couch, the campfire or the coffeehouse -- anywhere you want classic Fender playability and sound. 

FEATURESDreadnought body styleSolid spruce top with scalloped "X"-bracingMahogany back and sides Easy-to-play neck with rolled fingerboard edges

SOLID SPRUCE TOP
Spruce is the standard modern tonewood for fashioning the tops of acoustic guitars and other acoustic instruments -- few woods can beat its strength, brightness and dynamic range, and it responds well to any acoustic playing style, from hard strumming to fast flatpicking to delicate fingerpicking. 

EASY-TO-PLAY NECK
With it's comfortably rolled fingerboard edges, this intrument's neck creates an incredibly comfortable fret-hand feel that's ideal for beginning players or experienced pros alike. 

MAHOGANY BACK AND SIDES

Responds well to any acoustic playing style
